mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Personal Letter from Tho G. Shelor
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, personal letter dated August 3, 1861, to “Dear Doctor & William” from Tho G. Shelor, 1 original pieces – letter and envelope.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
